title: r/Choosingbeggars My Boss Fired Me, Then Begged Me For Money!
description: r/Choosingbeggars What kind of selfish, clueless jerk do you have to be to fire your employee, and then send that employee a Facebook message begging them to give you money? A choosing beggar, of course! And if you're wondering why the choosing beggar wants free money, it's because she's trying to save her failing business, LOL! Lady, your employees stop caring about your business the second you fire them!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
